sub_fields.label: Form Title
sub_fields.name: form_title
sub_fields.default_value: Fill out the form to download the white paper.

sub_fields.label: Form Embed Code
sub_fields.name: code_editor
sub_fields.instructions: Paste form code in the code editor.

sub_fields.label: Vimeo URL
sub_fields.name: embeds
sub_fields.instructions: Enter full Vimeo URL. No need to paste full embed code. Ex: https://vimeo.com/689770153/a54c836165

fields.label: Reports Components
fields.name: reports_component
fields.instructions:
Use the WYSIWYG field below the components field group to enter the report's leading paragraph. Select the Report category which makes the reports mobile featured image and reports menu toggle appear.
The reports menu grabs the key takeaways, all WYSIWYG H2s, and H3s and inserts into the menu.
